summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing personal plans and a potential dinner with Pritsker. Epstein mentions needing time to meet with Staley and suggests a trip to Harvard. The email contains confidentiality disclaimers and indicates the communication may be attorney-client privileged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing personal matters and a potential meeting with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, responding to Epstein about personal plans and indicating his availability.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating about personal plans and meetings, indicating a friendly relationship.

keyFacts: Epstein and Staley discuss a dinner with Pritsker.
Epstein mentions needing two to three hours with Staley.
Staley indicates he is free for dinner on Sunday.
The email contains confidentiality disclaimers and may be attorney-client privileged.
